what_this_proves: Strong empirical evidence of non-empty intersection Ψ(r)=Φ+∩Φ-(r) at multiple scales
Estimated box-counting-like index via regression across eps scales, with bootstrap CI
Robustness across seeds and padding; fit quality via R²; false-positive control via null models
Optional r-sweep can show local persistence around r0 (empirical analogue of thickness persistence)
limits: Not a formal proof of Hausdorff dimension; box-counting estimate on finite scales
Does not establish global monotonicity or uniform bounds for all r
